name: Bob The Cube v.1.0
description:
The most awesome game in this world lol.


I'm almost sure that you will enjoy that game as good as i did when i was making it. It's a platformer but not very complicated. Pls remember that it's my first game ever made XD So it might be kinda broken XD Also remember that this game will receive many updates in the future so follow informations on our discord!
